claim_text: According to the International Monetary Fund's (IMF) October 2023 projections, Italy's nominal GDP was estimated at $2.19 trillion for the year 2023.
The IMF projects Italy's nominal GDP to reach approximately $2.28 trillion in 2024.
In 2023, Italy's economy ranked as the 10th largest in the world by nominal GDP.
statistic_unit: th largest economy by nominal GDP

claim_text: In Euro terms, Italy's nominal GDP for 2023 was estimated to be approximately €2.01 trillion.
